text:
Sofia Vergara’s Casual Saturday Night Included Parrots, Mermaids and Her Modern Family Co-Stars

Saturdays look a lot different at the Vergara-Manganiello household than what we’re used to. Sofia Vergara shared snaps and Instagrams from her lavish Memorial Day bash at her home…
